title: Child Care Assistant
status: Part Time, 27.5 hours per week (4 day week)Minimum Requirements:High school diploma or general education degree (GED); or six months to one year related experience working with infants and toddlers; or equivalent combination of education and experience.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 2 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Child Care Assistant.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
